snippet: A suburban dad. A fictional television blowhard. And now a political money launderer. How one funny guy became three.
abstract: Comedian Stephen Colbert has stepped outside the persona of his fake news show and has begun to meddle in the real world; he is taking advantage of lax campaign finance laws and starting so-called super political action committees that pay for satirical political ads, all while still in character.
lead_paragraph: A suburban dad. A fictional television blowhard. And now a political money launderer. How one funny guy became three.

headline.main: How Many Stephen Colberts Are There?
headline.print_headline: How Many Stephen Colberts Are There?
